name: Horde Demon
description: The Horde Demon is a formidable fiend with a chaotic and evil presence, exhibiting various grotesque physical features. It adapts its attacks using the Varied Shapes ability, which grants it access to multiple distinct forms and attack types.
memorable: The Horde Demon can take on numerous forms and abuse its Varied Shapes ability to unleash a flurry of unpredictable attacks.
goals: To instigate fear and chaos among its enemies.
relations: Often found among other fiends and demons in chaotic environments.
environment: Primarily encountered in chaotic or evil-aligned planes or settings.
strengths: Damage immunities to poison, and resistances to cold, fire, and lightning damage.
weaknesses: Susceptible to radiant damage while bloodied, making it frightened.
attacks: Varied shapes allow it to deal slashing, piercing, bludgeoning, and psychic damage through a combination of melee and ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Varied Shapes, enabling it to utilize a diverse range of unique attacks.
senses: Darkvision up to 120 feet allows it to see in the dark effectively.
additional_information: Ability to frighten enemies with psychic attacks.
Each form it takes can inflict different types of damage.
Possesses a multiattack capability leveraging its unique abilities.
test_queries: varied shapes fiend with chaotic evil
chaotic creature that deals piercing damage
